metadata.title: CVE-2021-45293 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in Binaryen 103 due to an Invalidmemory address dereference in wasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::visitLet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45293` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binaryen - 108-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binaryen package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '108-1').
